For this campaign, it’s no big dollar fundraisers. No PACs. No federal lobbyists. No special access, or call time with rich donors. I spend my time with you! https://twitter.com/TeamWarren/status/1184499970961039366 QT @TeamWarren Some candidates spend their time at fancy fundraisers or on the phone asking billionaires for big checks.
